title: Chrome sees 18x increase in multi-window usage following tablet, foldable optimizations
content:
Over the past year, Google has been encouraging developers to optimize their apps for tablets and foldables. After having done so, Chrome has seen an 18x increase in multi-window usage on large screen devices.

more…

The post Chrome sees 18x increase in multi-window usage following tablet, foldable optimizations  appeared first on 9to5Google.
